gt_text: A season for sharing blessings Lunar New Year Gifting Exclusive gift sets from ¥8.88 Gifts for all generations Free wrapping service
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element the final image must contain:

*   Golden calligraphy title "Lunar New Year Gifting" at top center
*   Red lanterns framing title
*   Cloud motifs framing title
*   Small red font text "A season for sharing blessings" above title
*   Gold bordered ribbon with text "Exclusive gift sets from ¥8.88" below title
*   Family reunion dinner table
*   Gift boxes on table
*   Red envelopes on table
*   Oranges on table
*   Apples on table
*   Faint fireworks in sky
*   Traditional courtyard in background
*   Brand logo in lower right
*   Text "Gifts for all generations" in lower right area
*   Text "Free wrapping service" in lower right area
*   QR code styled as decorative seal in lower right
